meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Sweden.
meanings.sent1: In Sweden, you can buy a lot with just one skilling.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for Swedish skillings at the bank.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally paid with a skilling instead of a krona!
meanings.sent4: His savings were as scarce as a rare skilling coin.
meanings.sent5: The shiny skilling gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The act or process of acquiring knowledge or skills.
meanings.sent1: Learning new things is an essential part of skilling.
meanings.sent2: She dedicated herself to skilling in various fields.
meanings.sent3: His skilling in cooking improved after watching cooking shows.
meanings.sent4: Her skilling in painting blossomed like a beautiful flower.
meanings.sent5: Skilling is like collecting puzzle pieces to complete a picture.

meanings.definition: The act of providing training or education in a particular skill or subject.
meanings.sent1: The workshop focused on skilling employees in customer service.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in skilling programs for its staff.
meanings.sent3: The skilling session turned into a fun competition among colleagues.
meanings.sent4: She approached skilling as a way to empower others.
meanings.sent5: Skilling sessions were like planting seeds of knowledge in fertile minds.
